wblut.hemesh

Class HE_MeshStructure

  • java.lang.Object
    • wblut.hemesh.HE_Element
      • wblut.hemesh.HE_MeshStructure
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WB_HasData
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HE_Mesh, HE_Selection

    public class HE_MeshStructure
extends HE_Element
implements WB_HasData
    Collection of mesh elements. Contains methods to manipulate selections
    Author:
    Frederik Vanhoutte (W:Blut)
